text: Hey everyone,  I am hoping to get some tips on how to track buttons with GTM for GA4 events, from HubSpot embedded forms and HubSpot LPs. Any help and input will be massively appreciated
So my entire theme just broke, I'm importing a macros.html file. Its been working fine, but as of today the import no longer works. `{% import "../../templates/macros.html" as macros %}`

If i change the import to this `{% import "/sr/templates/macros.html" as macros %}`

it works...Â 

But the issue there is the root folder 'sr' may get renamed or be a child theme

VSCode extension question, I installed an Auto Close Tag and added an HTMLHubL item in Emmet Included Languages but it still doesn't auto close the tag unless I change from HTML-HubL to HTML on the bottom right on VSCode, any thoughts on this? Thanks!

In regards to the Cooking Tracking, if I have a site on both the HubSpot CMS (blog + landing pages) and WordPress (main site) does a user have to accept the cookie consent on both? Or if a user was to accept on a HubSpot page, when you navigate to the WordPress site, will the banner display again?

Hello All,
Recently we got notification that, *Action Needed: Update to your app required by February 28 for* granular CRM scopes migration. If I check my application the scopes are already changed to latest crm.xxxxxx. Do we need to change only on code scope with latest or any other changes required in HubSpot App?
